definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: This paper presents a strict analysis of the axial conformal slot-array on a metallic cylindrically-tipped wedge.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種嚴格分析圓楔體軸向共形縫隙陣的方法。

sentences.english: This paper applies conformal geometric algebra to analyze the reverse kinematics of serial robot.
sentences.chinese: 本文應用共形幾何代數分析串聯機器人的運動學反解。

sentences.english: Then using the principles, we analyse the mutual conductances between elements on cylindrical slot conformal array antennas.
sentences.chinese: 分析了圓柱縫隙共形陣天線單元間的互導納。

sentences.english: An achromatic conformal optical system working within infrared waveband was designed by him.
sentences.chinese: 他設計了一個紅外波段消色差共形光學系統。

sentences.english: Modular method is an effective method for solving extreme value problems of quasi—conformal mappings.
sentences.chinese: 模的方法是研究擬似共形映照極值問題的有效方法。

sentences.english: A novel broadband cylindrically conformal microstrip antenna with a single substrate is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新型的單層介質寬頻帶圓柱共形微帶天線。

sentences.english: Conformal microstrip antenna is known as a key technique in radio fuze system.
sentences.chinese: 共形微帶天線是無線電引信中的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: A novel beam steering system of a conformal cone-borne phased array is presented here.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的錐體共形相控陣波束控制方式。

sentences.english: An achromatic conformal optical system working within infrared waveband was designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一個紅外波段消色差共形光學系統。

sentences.english: Conformal Geometric Algebra(CGA) is a new tool for geometric representation and computation.
sentences.chinese: 共形幾何代數是一個新的幾何表示和計算工具。

sentences.english: The design principle of the circularly cylindrical conformal slotarray feeded by the couplings with the circularly curved waveguide is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出用圓弧彎波導耦合饋電的圓柱共形陳設計原理。
